scopes.name: schedule_only
scopes.explanation: Lines 4-156 comprise the full text of the Schedule to the ISDA 2002 Master Agreement, including all 'Parts' (1-5) and their subsections, but excluding the standard pre-printed Master Agreement, Credit Support Annexes, and signature pages. The Schedule begins at line 4 ('SCHEDULE') and ends at line 156, just before the signature and closing formalities. This span contains all negotiated terms and elections specific to the parties, which is what the query requests.
